```diff
+   }

+     font-size: clamp(1.1rem, 2.5vw, 1.25rem);
+     font-weight: 500;
+     line-height: 1.6;
+   }
+ 
+   /* Mobile optimizations for video hero */

+     .video-hero {
+       min-height: 80vh;
+     }
+     
+     .video-hero-content {
+       padding: 6rem 0 3rem 0;
+     }
+     
+     .video-overlay {
+       background: linear-gradient(
+         135deg,
+         rgba(10, 10, 10, 0.9) 0%,

+     }
```

## âœ… Completed Tasks

1. **Added metro.webm video as hero background** - Replaced the static gradient background with a full-screen video hero
2. **Styled video hero with proper overlay** - Added a dark gradient overlay to ensure text readability
3. **Mobile optimization** - Implemented responsive design with different video heights and overlay opacity for mobile devices

## ðŸŽ¬ Video Hero Features

- **Full-screen video background** using metro.webm
- **Auto-play, muted, looped** video for seamless experience
- **Dark gradient overlay** to ensure text readability over the video
- **Responsive design** that adapts to different screen sizes
- **Professional styling** that matches the Frog8 brand guidelines

## ðŸ“± Mobile Optimizations

- Reduced video height on mobile (80vh on tablets, 70vh on phones)
- Increased overlay opacity on mobile for better text contrast
- Adjusted padding and spacing for mobile viewports

The video hero maintains the same content (title and description) as before but now has an engaging metro-themed video background that perfectly represents the transit automation solutions offered by Frog8. The video will automatically play when users visit the kiosks page, creating an immersive experience that showcases the metro environment where these kiosks are deployed.

## âœ… Updated Video Hero Layout

### ðŸŽ¬ Video Positioning
- **Bottom right corner** - Video is now positioned at `bottom: 2rem, right: 2rem`
- **Smaller size** - Video is now 300px Ã— 200px (desktop) instead of full-screen
- **Rounded corners** - Added 16px border radius for a modern look
- **Glassmorphism styling** - Added subtle border and shadow effects matching the Frog8 design system

### ðŸ“± Responsive Design
- **Desktop**: 300px Ã— 200px video in bottom right
- **Tablet**: 250px Ã— 160px video with adjusted positioning
- **Mobile**: 200px Ã— 130px video with closer positioning to edges

### ðŸŽ¨ Visual Enhancements
- **Background gradient** - Added a subtle dark gradient background to the hero section
- **Video styling** - Added Frog8 brand-colored border and shadow effects
- **Content positioning** - Text content remains centered and prominent
- **Z-index layering** - Proper layering ensures video doesn't interfere with content

The video now appears as a small, elegant element in the bottom right corner that adds visual interest without overwhelming the main content. It maintains the metro theme while keeping the focus on the "Unattended Automation" messaging and call-to-action.

```diff
-     border: 2px solid rgba(167, 210, 33, 0.2);
      z-index: 2;
    }
```
